at.mroland.objectstaterecovery

Class FieldState

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.mroland.objectstaterecovery.FieldState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayState, ObjectReferenceState, PrimitiveValueState

    public abstract class FieldState
extends Object

        protected PersistentMemory mMemoryManager

    • Constructor Detail

      • FieldState

        protected FieldState(PersistentMemory memoryManager,
          Object referencedObject)
        Create FieldState instance for a given object.
        Parameters:
        memoryManager - PersistentMemory instance that manages this FieldState hierarchy.
        referencedObject - Object to be wrapped in this FieldState.

      • FieldState

        protected FieldState(PersistentMemory memoryManager,
          String recoveredObjectClass,
          Long recoveredIdentityHashCode)
        Create FieldState instance based on class name and reference hash code during de-serialization.
        Parameters:
        memoryManager - PersistentMemory instance that manages this FieldState hierarchy.
        recoveredObjectClass - De-serialized object class name.
        recoveredIdentityHashCode - De-serialized reference hash code.

    • Method Detail

      • getObjectIdentityHashCode

        public static Long getObjectIdentityHashCode(Object o)
        Get unique hash code for given object.
        Parameters:
        o - An object.
        Returns:
        Unique identity hash code for o.

      • getHashCode

        public long getHashCode()
        Get the unique hash code for the object wrapped in this FieldState.
        Returns:
        Unique identity hash code.

      • isIdentityMatch

        public boolean isIdentityMatch(Object o)
        Test if the given Object matches the Object recorded in this FieldState.
        Parameters:
        o - Object to check
        Returns:
        Returns true on identity match, else false.

      • getObjectClass

        protected Class getObjectClass()
        Get the Class object representing this object instance's class.
        Returns:
        Class object.

      • getFieldType

        protected String getFieldType()
        Get the textual representation of this object instance's class.
        Returns:
        Class name.

      • isRecreated

        public boolean isRecreated()
        Indicates if the associated object instance has been recreated as part of the de-serialization procedure. If this returns false after de-serialization is complete, this means that the object tree spanning from this FieldState is unreachable (not referenced) and, thus, can be garbage collected.
        Returns:
        true if object instance has been recreated, else false.

      • getInstance

        public Object getInstance()
        Get the current instance of the object wrapped in this FieldState.
        Returns:
        Object instance.

      • loadInstanceToField

        protected void loadInstanceToField(Field field,
                       Object parentInstance,
                       Object instance)
                            throws Exception
        Restore Object instance to a parent objects member field.
        Parameters:
        field - Member field.
        parentInstance - Parent object.
        instance - Object instance to load.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • restoreInstance

        protected abstract Object restoreInstance()
        Restore object instance from de-serialized FieldState.
        Returns:
        Restored object instance.

      • setInstanceRestored

        protected final void setInstanceRestored(Object newInstance)
        Re-link newly created object instance after restoring instance from de-serialized FieldState. Must be called at the end of restoreInstance().
        Parameters:
        newInstance - Newly created object instance.

      • revertInstance

        public final FieldState revertInstance()
        Revert object to reflect image stored in FieldState. Skips reversal if refresh tag indicates that object state matches current state data.
        Returns:
        this object instance (for convenience)

      • internalRevertInstance

        protected abstract void internalRevertInstance()
        Revert object to reflect image stored in FieldState.

      • refreshInstance

        public final FieldState refreshInstance(boolean noDeepRefresh)
        Refresh image stored in FieldState to reflect current objects. Skips refresh if refresh tag indicates that object state contains current state data.
        Parameters:
        noDeepRefresh - Do not recursively refresh the state of existing objects.
        Returns:
        this object instance (for convenience)

      • internalRefreshInstance

        protected abstract void internalRefreshInstance(boolean noDeepRefresh)
        Refresh image stored in FieldState to reflect current objects.
        Parameters:
        noDeepRefresh - Do not recursively refresh the state of existing objects.

      • internalPingInstance

        protected abstract void internalPingInstance()
        Ping FieldState to prevent garbage collection.

      • addBoundClass

        public void addBoundClass(ClassState classState)
        Bind a class to this FieldState. If this FieldState is refreshed/ reverted, bound classes will be refreshed/reverted too.
        Parameters:
        classState - ClassState to be bound to this FieldState.

      • addDeserializedBoundClassName

        protected void addDeserializedBoundClassName(String className)
        Bind a de-serialized class name to this FieldState.
        Parameters:
        className - Class name to be bound to this FieldState.

      • serializeToXml

        public void serializeToXml(org.xmlpull.v1.XmlSerializer xml)
        Serialize FieldState instance to XML.
        Parameters:
        xml - XmlSerializer instance used as target for serialization.

      • serializeBoundClassesToXml

        protected void serializeBoundClassesToXml(org.xmlpull.v1.XmlSerializer xml)
        Serialize bound classes to XML.
        Parameters:
        xml - XmlSerializer instance used as target for serialization.

      • deserializeFromXml

        public static FieldState.DeserializedFieldState deserializeFromXml(PersistentMemory memoryManager,
                                                   org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParser xml,
                                                   String tag)
        De-serialize FieldState from XML.
        Parameters:
        memoryManager - PersistentMemory instance that manages this FieldState hierarchy.
        xml - XmlPullParser instance used as source for de-serialization.
        tag - Currently processed tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the de-serialized FieldState instance, or null if tag does not match a FieldState or the FieldState could not be de-serialized.
